channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache HugeGraph-Hubble
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache HugeGraph-Hubble

item.title: CVE-2024-27347|2024-04-22T14:07:37.300Z -- Apache Software Foundation -- Apache HugeGraph-Hubble
item.description:
Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Apache HugeGraph-Hubble.This issue affects Apache HugeGraph-Hubble: from 1.0.0 before 1.3.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.3.0, which fixes the issue.
